alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier and central Hendry Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Naples to Golden Gate Estates to 6 miles south of Ave Maria. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Naples Park, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Lely Resort, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lely, Sunniland, Bunker Hill, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
